title: How do i check if I was banned
body:
Most of  my friends got their mystery skin except me and I'm pretty sure I wasn't banned this season if so how do I check? 

Edit: I've never had chat restriction, i barely talk in game

replies.body:
As far as I know, there is no way to check.

But don't lose hope. Not everyone has gotten their skins yet! You could get yours very soon.
